div.class: hero-media bg-image columns small-12 medium-6 small-order-1 medium-order-1
hero-text columns small-12 medium-6 small-order-2 medium-order-2

div.h1: Senior Living in San Dimas, CA

div.h2: Meet Serento Casa – Exceptional Service Under the California Sun

p.span: Natural beauty, endless comfort, and quality care for every stage—This is life at Serento Casa. Our vibrant senior living and care community is nestled away in the San Gabriel Valley in San Dimas, CA—the hidden gem of Los Angeles County. Offering three types of senior living and care with a personalized touch.

Begin a new journey, and enjoy a carefree lifestyle at Serento Casa. Discover enriching amenities, a wide variety of private apartment styles, and a place you can make new friends to explore with. Whether you want to enjoy the warm and balmy climate, dine on fine cuisine, visit our many museums and beautiful, lush parks, the best of California senior living is at your fingertips.

At Serento Casa, we’re here to make things easier and open up a new world of engagement with compassion, professionalism, and assurance. Here, you or your loved one(s) can feel your best, relax, and make new, meaningful connections. We are a Continuing Care Retirement Community (CCRC). With Assisted Living, Memory Care, and Post Acute Care options available, Serento Casa is the place to be.

div.p: Click below to learn more about each living option including amenities & services and floor plans:

div.h3: Some of Our Featured Amenities & Services

img.alt: A woman and man taking part in a senior fitness class
A woman and man taking part in a senior fitness class

div.p: Join us in the activity room for a variety of fun exercise classes as we Move More in March!

p.i: Contact us today for more information info@serentocasa.com
Contact us today for more information info@serentocasa.com

div.span: Very clean very nice staff always willing to help out

Serrento Casa has been a blessing. I was not able to find a place for my mother due to a family situation. Casa Serrento stepped in and took my mother in. They have been amazing with her. Everyone is so kind and professional. Jeremy, Nicol, and Gloria are angels from heaven as well as the other staff that has brought peace into our family knowing that she is well taken care off. If I could give a million starts I would.
Beautiful place very caring staff very friendly atmosphere lots of different services I recommend this place with more than 5 stars

Im leaving these five stars because of the front receptionist Named Kathy her communication skills are on point always multi tasking and ensuring everything is running smoothly, she makes sure that the patients within the facility know that she is there for them and has there backs to the fullest couldn’t ask for a better receptionist.

This was our 1st visit to Serento Casa, my sister in law Sally Hickman lives there. To see her so excited and talking to a lot of different people that she recently met and to call them “ friends”. I love all of what I saw today. We actually sat & had lunch with her and we visited her in her room that she is so comfortable and proud of. My husband and I Tony (Sally’s brother) left the building so happy for Sally that she is in a wonderful place.

img.onload: (function(el, data) {var f = function() { window.grw_init ? grw_init(el, data) : setTimeout(f, 400) }; f() })(this, 'slider');

div.h3: A message from our Senior Executive Director – Steven Fairchild
div.p: “Generations is truly a family taking care of families where work doesn’t really feel like work. At Serento Casa we put people first by meeting them when they are—both emotionally and physically—to work with their unique needs. To me, our Vitality program truly embodies the experience of living—embracing and living a purposeful and meaningful life.”

div.class: columns small-12 medium-6 small-order-1 medium-order-1 flush

img.alt: The Community Executive Director wear a shirt and tie and smiles widely at the camera while standing under trees.
The Community Executive Director wear a shirt and tie and smiles widely at the camera while standing under trees.

p.a: 1740 S. San Dimas Avenue San Dimas, CA 91773

div.div:
Serento Casa’s Living Options
Assisted Living,
Memory Care,
Post-Acute Care,

img.p: Generations is a unique, holistic network of senior living communities focused on innovation, exceptional care, and vitality for every resident and family.

div.p: Enter your email address for more info:
